text:
When I started the apache2 services on Windows server 20003, few hours later, 
i found one of the apache.exe got 4GB in "Non-Paged Dynamic Storage Pool", i 
don't know what it is but others got only few KBs,and no one more than 1MB. 
Does this seems fine??
creator: bi11gates@21cn.com
jorton@redhat.com
text:
"it broke" is not a bug report - you need to narrow this down to something more
specific.  Try users@httpd.apache.org for further help.
